sentences.en: After an exhaustive search the missing document was found.
sentences.cn: 经过彻底搜寻丢失的文件被找到了.

sentences.en: After exhaustive review of the whole situation, Mr. Murphy gave his opinion.
sentences.cn: 在详细检讨全盘情况后, 墨斐先生提出了自己的见解.

sentences.en: An exhaustive investigation of the facts proves the contrary.
sentences.cn: 彻底地调查事实后发现情况正好相反.

sentences.en: Can you produce an exhaustive list of the library books?
sentences.cn: 你能否提供一份图书馆的全部藏书名单?

sentences.en: Diligent and exhaustive testing is no substitute for careful design.
sentences.cn: 用心和彻底的测试并不是仔细设计的替代品.

sentences.en: For the full, exhaustive run - down of what's included, hit the link below.
sentences.cn: 想了解更全面的信息 以及 详细的运行方式, 请点击一下链接.

sentences.en: He has got a protracted, exhaustive siege of illness.
sentences.cn: 他得了一种长期而耗费体力的疾病.

sentences.en: It is the end product of exhaustive research and development.
sentences.cn: 这是全面研发后的最终成品。
让我们做一次深入的研究.

sentences.en: Melville incorporated in " Moby Dick " an exhaustive encyclopaedia of whaling lore.
sentences.cn: 梅尔维尔在《白鲸 》 中汇集了各种捕鲸知识.

sentences.en: The author's treatment of the subject is exhaustive.
sentences.cn: 该作者对这个问题的分析很透彻。

sentences.en: The list is by no means exhaustive.
The research is not an exhaustive but an exemplary one.
sentences.cn: 这些缺陷是例证性的,而不是穷尽性的.

sentences.en: There are a variety of complicated procedural devices set out in exhaustive detail in the section.
sentences.cn: 还有一些各种各样的混杂的诉讼程序和烦琐的细节.

sentences.en: These four goals are not an exhaustive list of alternatives.
sentences.cn: 以上四个目标不是所有的选择.

sentences.en: This kind of classification is not exhaustive.
sentences.cn: 这种分类法并不是包罗无遗的.

words.tran_cn: 使筋疲力尽的；使耗尽的
耗尽；用尽；使…精疲力尽（exhaust的过去式）
耗尽；使…精疲力竭；排出（exhaust的ing形式）
排出；耗尽；使精疲力尽；彻底探讨
